pci_sdr1.title: 2nd Cell Physical Cell ID
pci_sdr1.description: Physical Cell ID. Range 0 to 503. Equal to (ORS Serial number + 252) modulo 504 by default

cell_id_sdr1.title: 2nd Cell Cell ID
cell_id_sdr1.description: Cell ID. Equal to (ORS Serial number + 128) modulo 256 by default

root_sequence_index_sdr1.title: 2nd Cell Root Sequence Index
root_sequence_index_sdr1.description: Range: 0 to 137. Equal to (ORS serial number + 79) modulo 138 by default. Sets PRACH root sequence index (SIB2.rootSequenceIndex field). It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.
